short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use spacebar to scroll the window around with precision.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use spacebar and your mouse to pan up, down, left, and right in the browser window with precision. Works with oversized images (zoomed in) and regular websites. 

Will likely feel familiar to Photoshop users. 

*Note: This does not work with PDF files in the browser as they are displayed in an isolated component.
